column4: hmm, my update manager is no longer notifying me of updates...
how often do you have it set up to check for updates?
daily
i have updates now, but no notification
and youre noticing that there are more than one update a day? if thats the case it will only check 1 time per day regardless of how many there are that day
i know that. but twice now, i opened update manager and found there were updates
i just opened in now, and there's 20
before, i couldn't get rid of an alert saying my package info is out of date. now, since they updated the update manager, it doesn't alert me at all
and apparently i'm not the only one
mmm i dont know then :/  ... sorries
i don't appear to have the update daemon thingy running. do you know what it's called?
I can check    1 sec
it's called update-notifier   thats how it is on my session properties
right. *smacks forehead*
that was the problem. it wasn't running. i ran it, and now got the alert
hehe that's silly ^_^;; it happens
i think it's because i killed it to make that alert go away :P
XD
it was having issues. there was a bug. killing it was necessary
that generally doesn't search _within_ files
I thought he meant, "the word is part of the file name", not  "the word is INSIDE the file name" my mistake ^_^;;
